Title: Define Hive Table Schema for Flights
Body: Create a Hive table named flights with columns for flight_date, delays, and cancellations.

Title: Upload Flights CSV to HDFS
Body: Move flights.csv into /user/hive/warehouse/flights using hdfs dfs -put.

Title: Load Data into Hive Table
Body: Run LOAD DATA INPATH and validate row count.
